extra.enrollment_requirement: Prerequisite  Level 4 and (registration in a POLS major or medial plan) and POLS250 and (a GPA of 2.5 on all units in POLS).

basic.description: This seminar will examine key texts in the discipline of political science. The focus of this course will vary from year to year. See the departmental website for further details.
basic.subject: POLS
basic.title: Seminar in Political Science
